class.name: Set
class.description: Represents a set data structure. Similar to a Dictionary, but stores only keys instead of key-value pairs.

method.name: add
method.description: Add an element to the set.

method.name: has
method.description: Check for existence of an element within the set.

method.name: clear
method.description: Remove all elements from the set.

method.name: erase
method.description: Remove a specific element from the set.

method.name: size
method.description: Get the size of the set.
